title: Seafood salad
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) sea scallops', '100g (4 oz) medium prawns', '250g (9 oz) fresh mussels', '100g (4 oz) squid rings', '100g (4 oz) Kalamata olives, pitted', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large clove garlic, minced', 'small handful minced fresh parsley', 'small handful minced fresh chives', '1/4 teaspoon dried crushed chillies (optional)', '1 lemon, sliced', '1 medium red onion, thinly sliced', '1 (300g) bag Continental salad greens', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
